name: Yemeni Cultural Heritage at Risk
description: Help us find and geotag photos of Yemeni cultural heritage sites
why: Help us identify cultural heritage in Yemen at risk due to the on-going civil war

questionnaire.question: Do you think there is built heritage in this photo?
What is the name of the site shown in this photo?
Do you see any damage to the building that is not caused by general deterioration over time?
Can you geo-localize the site and/or the photo?
